text: Cassidy Jacqueline Hutchinson (born December 12, 1996) is a former White House aide. She was the assistant to Chief of Staff Mark Meadows during the first presidency of Donald Trump. Hutchinson testified at the June 28, 2022 public hearings of the United States House Select Committee on the January 6 Attack. She talked about President Donald Trump's actions before and during the January 6 United States Capitol attack. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1996 births Category:American autobiographers Category:Writers from New Jersey Category:Politicians from New Jersey Category:2021 United States Capitol attack
title: Cassidy Hutchinson
